name: Contributor Media Files Upload Access
author: Md Abul Bashar

sections.description:
Just Allow Media files Upload access for Contributor users role.

Just Install then it’s worked. don’t need any more step. If you want then you can see documentations with screenshot Contributor Media Files Upload Access
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working. Just Install then it’s worked. don’t need any more step. If you want then you can see documentations with screenshot Contributor Media Files Upload Access

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to install this plugin?

Just follow this information 1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory 2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
